title: 服务器玩家使用所有牌子没用。内有详情
author: DarcJC
txt_content:
玩家右键牌子时没有用
使用/warp 地标时还会说没有权限
问题是在ess中这个有设置

# If you do not wish to use a permission system, you can define a list of 'player perms' below.
# This list has no effect if you are using a supported permissions system.
# If you are using an unsupported permissions system, simply delete this section.
# Whitelist the commands and permissions you wish to give players by default (everything else is op only).
# These are the permissions without the "essentials." part.

求解为毛= -用的是指令牌子也不行权限也给了
如下
groups:
  Default:
    default: true
    permissions:
    - -bukkit.command.kill
    - serversigns.use.*
    inheritance:
    - g:groupmanager_default
    - g:bukkit_default
    - g:essentials_default
    - g:towny_default
    info:
      prefix: '&e'
      build: false
      suffix: ''
复制代码

这样也还是不行啊= -。求解啊。配置文件发到mcbbs可能格式没了。但是配置是正确的= -
求解！！！


在附上服务器插件列表
 Plugins (24): LaggRemover, TeleportSigns, GroupManager, PlugMan, WorldEdit, Credit, mmSupernaturals, DrugsXL, Lores, DakadoHealth, Vault, Multiverse-Core, ServerSave, LoreAttributesREVIVE, NOUnlimitedPickup, RPG_Items, NoBoom, iConomy, ProtocolLib, Essentials, VIP, ServerSigns, EssentialsSpawn, Quests
复制代码

replies.author: 路人_mid
replies.txt_content: 好像记得  要把serversigns.use这个指令附加到牌子上

replies.author: 煽火点风
replies.txt_content: 权限组一般由GM控制，warp的权限是ess.warp

replies.author: DarcJC
replies.txt_content:
路人_mid 发表于 2015-7-30 22:37
好像记得  要把serversigns.use这个指令附加到牌子上
也是不行

是essentials.....你这啥答案= -
